_comment: Default placeholder definitions for Context Forge seeding. Used by seed_forge.py and documented for reference.

tool.name: placeholder_echo
tool.description: Echoes input text back. Use as a wiring test for the HomePilot wizard.

a2a_agent.name: placeholder_agent
a2a_agent.description: Placeholder A2A agent for wiring the HomePilot wizard. Replace with a real agent later.

gateway.name: placeholder_gateway
gateway.description: Placeholder MCP gateway for development. Replace with a real gateway endpoint.

server.name: placeholder_server
server.description: Placeholder virtual server for aggregating tools. Replace with real configuration.
